posts.post_content: This card looks amazing for Jund. Sacrifice things to power up your [Rockslide Elemental](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rockslide Elemental)s, [Scavenger Drake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scavenger Drake)s, and [Algae Gherial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Algae Gherial)s. And that helps with [Dragon Appeasement](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dragon Appeasement). I'm looking forward to getting mine at the prerelease.
posts.html:
This card looks amazing for Jund. Sacrifice things to power up your Rockslide Elementals, Scavenger Drakes, and Algae Gherials. And that helps with Dragon Appeasement. I'm looking forward to getting mine at the prerelease.

Posted By: HoboBobby (4/30/2009 7:05:40 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This card is just amazingly kick\*\*\*. Between the various dragon buff cards out there, this shouldn't be a problem. Combo it with any number of Jund cards that give a bonus when you sac a creature, and you're golden. Crucible of Fire? Even if it's not devouring anything, you've got a 4/4 flier. Doubling Season? Pop out two, devour one, and it becomes a 5/5. Lots of options here, and at the end of it, you've just got at on of fliers going around. Great card, great card.
posts.html:
